Summer Mini Boho Ruffle Swing Dress This summer Bohemian dress has a V-neck design and a flounce sleeve with a pleated waist to easily cover up the arms and waist, which is very special and unique.The hem of dress is full of ruffles, and the chiffon fabric makes the dress softer and more flowing. The loose and casual style is suitable for all ladies.When you take a leisurely stroll in the summer, the swinging hem will leave a wonderful impression.All the prints are bright and warm and give off a summer romance. If you look great in heels and ankle boots, combined with sandals and a small bag, you will definitely attract more attention.

Reviews On Size From Customers For Reference By Aleksey rybakov (Color: Pink Dot, Size: Small) Beautiful flowy dress just as pictured. I got the pink one size S and I weigh 120 lb and am 5'7. By Avilena(Color: Olive Print, Size: Small) Perfect dress for summer! I am 5.4, 126 pounds. Bought size Small. Very pleased with the quality! By Michele (Color: Olive Print, Size: Large) Material is really nice, I am 5’4 179 lbs and I’m a 38DDD just for reference. I ordered a large in this dress and It fit perfect. The color was more green then I wanted but It was still really cute and very comfortable totally worth the purchase for my husband promotion ceremony! By Sallie Guerrero (Color: Green Print, Size: Large) Very pretty! A lot of compliments. Flattering style. I’ll definitely purchase more colors! I’m 5ft 1in 155lb & a large fits a little loose but very comfortable. Hemline is slightly above knee.Perfect summer dress! By Jenna (Color:Black Print, Size: Large) Love this dress. I bought a size L, I’m 5’4” 200 lbs and it fits perfect! Planning on wearing it for engagement photos!! By Diana (Color: Pink Dot, Size: Medium) such a perfect dress. Super cute. If it helps with picking sizing i am 5 foot and weight 160lbs and i got a medium and it was perfect on me.

Color Show&Size Information Quick Q&A,about this boho ruffle swing dress. Q1: How do you wash this dress?A1: Hand washing is recommended.Because it made of comfortable and soft Chiffon.It is best to wash dark, light and different colored clothes separately.Q2: What's the style of this dress?A2: This dress is in a casual style.It is suitable for many scenes,such as graduation,work,party,travel,etc.Q3: What kind of lady does this dress suit?A3: This dress is suitable for all ladies. It has elastic waist and lotus leaf design at the front, making you look elegant and charming.Q4: How to match this dress ?A4: This dress can be matched with different accessories, cardigan, high heels and sandals.It's very suitable for summerQ5: Will this women summer dress see through?A5: Don't worry. This dress can't be worn through, and in order to make you more comfortable, it has lining.Q6: How is the quality of this dress？A6: The quality of the dress is very good, it is not easy to deform, the texture is light and thin, it is breathable and drape, and it is very comfortable to wear.

Dress details The sexy v-neck Combine a mini Bohemian print skirt with a sexy V-neck and pair it with a beautiful necklace to make you look sweet and gentle. Lotus leaf sleeve The cascading folds, irregular cuff adds the simple sense that hangs down, the thick arm that can cover you not only, still can promote feminine taste, tie-in gives recreational elegant temperament. Fold at the waist The waist has the unique cascading design, enhances the three-dimensional sense, highlights your slender waist branch The swing hem The flowing A-line skirt and perfect tailoring will make your body look slimmer, perfect for summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This is might be the best item of clothing I have bought on Amazon and possibly the most comfortable dress I've ever worn.I bought 3 different colors because I wasn't sure which one I would like best. Ended up keeping the blue because the fit was slightly looser and the material was softer than the pink and yellow.The dress is lined so you can't see through, but the sleeves and very bottom of the dress are sheer. I would still wear nude underwear with this. The lining is very silky and I haven't had any issues with static, riding up, etc.I am on the shorter side so it goes a little past my knees but I like that. I also like that it's a breathable neckline without showing cleavage. I can wear a regular bra with it as well which is great.I'm 13 weeks pregnant in the pictures, 5'3, 163 lbs. Bra size is a 36 DD. Largest bust measurement is 41. Pant size Large, 12. Top size medium-large. Dress fits very well with lots of room for my stomach and I can imagine this will still fit when I'm further along. Bust area has some room to grow into as well, but the size large was perfect for me.I haven't washed it yet, so I can't speak to that, but I'm super excited about this pretty dress that I could wear all day!Also, the blue print that I got has brown in it. I didn't realize that when I bought it but i still like it. Not noticeable from far away. I added a picture of the pattern in bad lighting.Edit: I washed the dress in cold water and air dried, turned out fine no issues!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, so comfy!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this dress for family pictures. I hate that I don’t have a better picture of the front of the dress, but I love the fact that the v-neck is not too low - it showed no cleavage, I didn’t have to pull it up at all during all our multiple pose pics! I am about 183 lbs, 5’3, 38D with a momma belly and ordered an XL. I might’ve been able to fit a L, but I think it might’ve been a little too tight toward the top, as this dress really doesn’t have stretch. It’s a great length, very flattering and just the right amount of flowy! Makes me feel super confident while still trying to get back to my pre-pregnancy weight. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made and beautiful, breezy fabric
reviews.reviewText: I loved the print and the colors are beautiful! Lightweight chiffon which is perfect for the summer. Fully lined. The hem of the dress and sleeves is an overlock stitch which is very common for this type of fabric. I was a professional seamstress and saw this all the time. It is a way to keep a nice soft flowing edge because folding it over and stitching it makes it a little stiffer, and then it doesn't drape as well.The lining is shorter than the actual skirt length. There is an inset ruffle under the bust line and I felt like this was not flattering on my body type. I am 5'8", 135 lb and wear a small or 3/5. This fit true to size. I think the dress is cute. It just doesn't look good on me. I felt like it took away my curves and gave me no shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this dress for an outdoor wedding. I was very impressed with the quality and with the fit. The color was beautiful and true to what I ordered. I will be able to wear this dress for many occasions. I loved how comfortable it was to wear. This dress was such a great value! I was impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but Thin
reviews.reviewText: I almost kept this dress. But it wasn't great. Just okay. I ordered two dresses for an upcoming wedding and I liked the look of this one so much. But the tipping point for me returning it is when I held it up on a hanger in my bedroom I could clearly see the picture on my wall through the dress. Sure I could've found a slip, but I was already on the fence about it.It was cute and flattering which is why I almost kept it, but it wasn't made great. One of the shoulders had a large bunch in the sewing and there were a handful of loose threads. And it felt slightly off center. Also the lining layer was suuuper short. Like I'm not sure i could've sat properly without the under side riding up. And the sleeves hit my elbow, which bothered me a smidge. I wanted them to rest slightly above it. None of these things were major by themselves, but when I realized that I could see straight through two layers it was enough to make me return it.If you have a slip and don't mind tiny imperfections this dress would be great. Since I had ordered two dresses I simply went with the other one, but I could've made this one work.I am 5'3", 165#, with a large chest and I ordered the large and it fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this dress and the beautiful fabric made it perfect for an outdoor wedding but could also be worn for almost any occasion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed in this dress, it's very transparent, you would have to wear a full slip. The material feels very cheap, I don't know how everyone says it feels expensive, I completely disagree. I'm 5'3 and 130 and a small was a little big still so the waistline hits me too low and the length was longer than knee length. Not a fan at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Busty girl approved
reviews.reviewText: I got this dress along with about four others to wear to a wedding and this was the only one that was a winner! I am a 36K and I struggle to find dresses that are flattering on my chest and I’m not falling out of and this one is perfect. It’s cute, flattering, and while I’m not showing a bunch of skin, it doesn’t feel conservative and it feels fitting for a 24 year old. I’m also wearing it to a bridal shower too. Very versatile and cute.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty, versatile, comfortable dress, that looks better on curvy women than the thin model.
reviews.reviewText: Pretty dress that's easy to dress up or down.I am 5' 3" and have 43" bust. Bought an XL which fit snugly but not uncomfortably across the bust, and came to my knees (which I prefer). A larger size would have been too big.I think the thin model in the pic doesn't do justice to the dress. It looks better on curvy women!Four stars because the material was a little thinner than I expected, so the satiny liner gave the dress an odd shine that I noticed. Others didn't so it isn't bad.

Was really pleased with this dress. It fit well, I ordered a large so it would be a looser fit, it is well made and I was happy it had a lining. It came just above my knees...........the color was what I expected. I would recommend this dress.

I ordered the olive dress with the tie waist. What I received was a forest green dress with ruffles. It is a cute dress, it fits nicely, but the colour and style are not what I ordered. The dress appears to be good quality, and has a fairly thick green slip. I also purchased the black and white version, and received a ruffled dress with orange flowers all over it and would be a cute fall dress, but not even close to what I ordered.
This is such a cute dress very nice material, and looks great on. I’m 5’4” 190 lbs and it fit very wellWould highly recommend this dress for summer or a vacation getaway.

reviews.reviewTitle: Way too baggy. I ordered a small and probably could have put an extra me in there..
